metdetection.generic

Class MidiModelState

  • java.lang.Object
    • metdetection.generic.MidiModelState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeatTrackingModelState, JointModelState, MetricalModelState, VoiceSplittingModelState

    public abstract class MidiModelState
extends java.lang.Object
    A MidiModelState contains the state of any of our MidiModels. Each state has a score, accessible by the getScore() method, and their natural ordering is based on this score.
    Author:
    Andrew McLeod - 4 Sept, 2015

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MidiModelState()

    • Constructor Detail

      • MidiModelState

        public MidiModelState()

    • Method Detail

      • getScore

        public abstract double getScore()
        Get the score of this MidiModelState. In general, a higher score reflects that a State is more likely given our prior knowledge. The natural ordering of MidiModelStates is based on this score value.
        Returns:
        The score of this MidiModelState.

      • handleIncoming

        public abstract java.util.TreeSet<? extends MidiModelState> handleIncoming(java.util.List<MidiNote> notes)
        Return a TreeSet of all of the possible MidiModelStates which we could tansition into given the List of MidiNotes.
        Parameters:
        notes - A List of the MidiNotes on which we need to transition.
        Returns:
        A TreeSet of MidiModelStates which we've transitioned into.

      • close

        public abstract java.util.TreeSet<? extends MidiModelState> close()
        Return a TreeSet of all of the possible MidiModelStates which we could tansition into when the input closes.
        Returns:
        A TreeSet of the MidiModelStates we've transitioned into.
